author: hsiaowei
content:
I think it is a on purpose "multi fork" test case that starts with bellatrix state, forks to capella, and then forks to deneb.
/cc'ing <@881905303011086387> the test case author to double confirm.

author: etan_status
content: yes, the first folder is the one that indicates where to start on. The ones in the back (in the test name) indicate possible followup forks that are being advanced to as part of the test. See `tests/formats/light_client/sync.md` for explanations on what forks to use when loading individual `steps.yaml`
